author: SFist
title: Ground News - Fired Oakland Police Chief LeRonne Armstrong Was One of Three Candidates for Chief That Mayor Thao Rejected
text:
Summary by SFist Oakland Mayor Sheng Thao has been in a long and drawn out battle of wills with the city's police commission almost since she took office in January. And the latest drama in that fight came with her rejection of a slate of three finalist candidates for the next chief of police that the commission sent to her desk earlier this month.It was the week before Christmas when the Oakland Police Commission, following a candidate search that lasted over n… Share menu More
